Data: Jadeja to Warner, FOUR runs just over long-on. Gurkeerat there but he wasn't on the boundary. Flighted delivery on middle, Warner heaves the swipe over long-on. The ball lands inside the boundary. Could have been an opportunity if he was on the boundary
Jadeja to Warner, 2 runs worked to square leg for a quick couple. Played that well. Soft hands
Jadeja to Warner, no run 92 kph, flat outside off, Warner punches to midwicket off the back foot
Jadeja to Warner, no run driven back to the bowler
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat and straight on middle, pushed back
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run flat on leg, Warner turns this with the spin to square leg
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run tossed up outside off, Warner gets down early and misses his slog sweep.

Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run, OUT Marsh may be gone. This will be a huge wicket. marsh is gone. What a fortunate dismissal that is for India. Short outside off, Warner crashes a cut to deep point. And calls Marsh through. The throw is not very good, bounces just in front of Gurkeerat. The ball hits the knee of Gurkeerat and then ricochet
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run short outside off, smashed to cover who fields well
Gurkeerat to Warner, no run short and wide, hit to cover.
Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven to long-off. Warner key
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run tossed up outside off, Marsh squeezes the drive to an interestingly-placed short mid-off. Kohli runs around and throws it to the non-striker but Marsh makes the run
Jadeja to Marsh, no run tossed up outside off, Marsh goes for the hard sweep. Beaten
Jadeja to Marsh, no run floated up on off, driven to cover
Jadeja to Marsh, no run nice bowling. Tossed up on off, Marsh comes down to clip but inside-edges onto his pad
Jadeja to Marsh, no run driven to Pandey at cover who stops at least a run, fantastic fielding
Jadeja to Marsh, no run another thigh delivery. Marsh can't get it off the square
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run worked off his pads to deep midwicket. Great over, just one off it
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run tossed up on middle, Marsh comes down to flick to midwicket
Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run short and wide outside off, Warner drags it to long-on
Gurkeerat to Marsh, FOUR runs very dangerous shot. Yorker on middle, Marsh gets down early to sweep very hard between the gap at backward square leg
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run driven to long-off
Gurkeerat to Warner, SIX runs huge six. Warner continues to counterattack. Flat on off, Warner gets down on one knee to swipe the slog sweep very high over the midwicket boundary. Big six, way back
Gurkeerat to Warner, 1 run driven to long-on
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run flat on leg, tucked to deep midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run fine paddle. Flat outside off, Marsh gets down early to play that stroke
Jadeja to Warner, 2 runs Warner backs away and flays a cut to cover. Misfield by Gurkeerat who allows the extra runs
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run turned to deep midwicket for one
Jadeja to Marsh, no run floated up on off, driven to cover
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run flat on middle, drilled to long-on
R Dhawan to Marsh, 3 wide starts the spell with a full ball slanted down leg. Misses the flick and Dhoni can't collect, the ball deflects away into the fine leg region
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run very full on off stump, almost in the blockhole, driven to mid-off
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run full, once again drifting into the pads, poor ball with fine leg in the circle, but Marsh picks out the fielder with his flick
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run slower ball on middle stump, checks his drive to chip down the ground to long-on
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run full outside off, swiped with a lot of bottom hand to long-on
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run back of a length slower ball on middle stump, punched to straight midwicket
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run another slower one, full on off and middle, driven to long-on
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on off stump, goes back to punch to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run sees Warner stepping out and fires it into his pads. Warner clips it quietly to square leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run fullish, goes with the arm towards off stump. Looks for the cover drive but can only hit it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Warner, no run quickish length ball on off stump, defended to short midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run quickish again, a little shorter. Warner goes back and across to work to deep square leg

R Dhawan to Warner, FOUR runs slower ball, but it's short, and there's plenty of width. Warner was initially looking to make room, but he had enough time to take a big step across with his back foot and chop it away to the right of backward point
R Dhawan to Warner, 2 runs short and wide again, slapped to sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run slower ball, fuller now and outside off, Warner jabs it down to long-off
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on for the push to sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Warner, 1 run full and wide, slapped to the left of sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run back of a length, angling into the batsman and cramping him for room, Marsh tucks it to midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, no run back of a length, a bit of turn in to cramp Warner's cut. Slaps it to short cover
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run a bit fuller and straighter. Warner shuffles across to tuck it through square leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run length ball on off stump, stays back and punches to short extra cover
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run a little more width, slapped to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Warner, no run stays back to a full ball on off stump, defends hurriedly to short cover
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run sees him coming down the track and fires it at his pads. Warner flicks towards short fine leg
Yadav to Warner, FOUR runs ooh, and he produces an edge first up. Slants across Warner from a lovely length, opens him up, and he jabs at it and nicks through the vacant slip region
Yadav to Warner, 1 run shortish on off stump, jumps across and works it to long leg
Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs fullish outside off, and Marsh flows forward and drives, finishes with a high left elbow as the ball races away to the left of mid-off
Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs short, wide, no one back on the square boundary and Marsh gets on top of the bounce and cuts it away to the point boundary with his weight on the front foot
Yadav to Marsh, no run back of a length, a bit closer to off stump, defended to backward point
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run not quite short enough to pull, drags it from off stump towards long leg
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs back of a length on off stump, goes back and cuts to the left of sweeper cover
Jadeja to Marsh, no run full on off stump, presses forward and pushes to the left of short cover, and the fielder moves quickly to deny him the single
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run length ball on middle stump, Marsh uses his wrists to whip that towards long-on
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat, angling into middle stump, clipped to the left of short midwicket, where Pandey dives to make the stop
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run a touch shorter and he can work it wider of the midwicket fielder to pick up one
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run full on the pads, flicked away through square leg
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run length ball on off stump, comes forward for the checked drive through the covers

Yadav to Warner, 3 runs short ball on off stump, Warner plays that trademark checked pull of his, and Rohit has to put in a lot of work, sprinting to his right from long leg and diving to stop it at the rope
Yadav to Marsh, SIX runs oh my. Another long-hop from Umesh, angling into the batsman, and he pulls that with utter contempt, launches it over the backward square leg boundary

Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs slower ball wide of off stump, that is just too much width. Marsh sets himself up on the front foot, gets into a strong, stable position and rolls his wrists over to thrash that to the point boundary
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run short again, this one gets up to chest height, Marsh stands tall and pulls to deep square leg
Yadav to Warner, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched to deep point
Jadeja to Warner, no run flat and full on middle and leg. Warner goes back and across to work it into the leg side and Pandey dives to his left to stop it at midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, no run full on off stump, and now Jadeja cuts it off by moving quickly to his left. Warner was looking for the driven single to long-on
Jadeja to Warner, no run full on off and middle, clipped to midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, no run once again it's quick and full on off stump and once again Pandey moves quickly to his left at midwicket to rule out the single
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run a bit slower, and the line is a bit closer to the pads. Warner can work it squarer this time to pick up a single to the deep square leg fielder
Jadeja to Marsh, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to short cover
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run length ball on off stump, punched down the ground and Ishant moves to his left from mid-off to stop it
Bumrah to Marsh, 1 run length ball on off and middle and Marsh is a little late on his defensive push. The ball ricochets off the inside edge through square leg
Bumrah to Warner, no run fullish on off and middle, punched to midwicket
Bumrah to Warner, no run back of a length on off stump, goes back and tucks it to midwicket
Bumrah to Warner, no run back of a length close to off stump, punched back to the bowler
Bumrah to Warner, no run a touch shorter, hurries on as Warner looks to pull from outside off, can only hit it to mid-on
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs tossed up on middle stump, chipped cleverly over the bowler's head to pick up two. Long-on has quite a bit of distance to cover to his left
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run looks to sweep but it slides on and hits his back thigh. Appeal for lbw but it was missing leg stump
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run full on off and middle, clipped to long-on
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run fullish outside off, flat-batted towards sweeper cover
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run shortish, turns down leg, Warner pulls to deep square leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run fullish on middle stump, blocked towards short extra cover
Bumrah to Warner, no run slower ball outside off, can't time his drive and short cover moves in quickly to stop it
Bumrah to Warner, no run back of a length outside off. Another slower one and it doesn't come on for the cut. Slaps to that man Pandey at short cover

Bumrah to Warner, 2 runs back of a length close to off stump. Warner lets it come on and chops it crisply to the left of third man. Takes the first run quickly, and he completes the second comfortably enough to break into his usual leaping century celebration. This has been another excellent innings. He's paced it so well and Australia
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run fuller and straighter now, driven back down the ground and it deflects off the stumps towards mid-on
Bumrah to Marsh, no run back of a length, angling into off stump. Marsh is cramped for room a little, ends up jabbing it towards mid-off
Bumrah to Marsh, 2 runs bouncer, Marsh keeps the hook down well, took it from around head height and played it down towards deep backward square leg

Sharma to Warner, FOUR runs length ball on off stump and that is a spectacular shot. Makes a bit of room and uses his wrists to take it on top of the bounce and flay it away between mid-off and extra cover
Sharma to Warner, 1 run back of a length on off stump, no width for the cut and he chops it down a short distance from him, into the off side
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run length ball outside off, driven on the up to the left of the diving Pandey at short cover
Sharma to Warner, 2 runs fullish outside off and Warner shuffes across to clip it elegantly to the left of long-on
Sharma to Warner, SIX runs length ball on off stump and Warner dismisses it. Clears his front leg and swings through the line, back over the bowler's head and clears the straight boundary as well
Sharma to Warner, no run back of a length on middle stump. Makes a bit of room and punches to short cover
Bumrah to Marsh, 1 run length ball on off stump, gets forward for the checked push down the ground to the right of mid-off, and brings up his half-century
Bumrah to Warner, 2 runs Warner comes down the track, making a bit of room, and Bumrah goes full and wide. Warner jams down on the ball and squeezes it out towards third man

Bumrah to Warner, no run whoa. That was a high full-toss, probably not over waist high, but it caught Warner off-guard, and he lost balance as he looked to swat it away into the leg side, and lost his grip on his bat handle too. Warner falls to the floor, bat goes flying away into the slip region
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run slower ball on middle stump, clipped down the ground, looking for two, but long-on rushes in quickly to keep them down to one

Bumrah to Marsh, no run back of a length, angling into middle and leg. Was the slower one again, and Marsh closed his bat face too soon, looking to work it into the leg side. Leading edge pops up into the short cover region
Bumrah to Marsh, no run low full-toss on off stump, jabbed to mid-off
Sharma to Warner, 1 run sees him make room and follows with the blockhole ball outside leg. Squeezed away towards short cover
Sharma to Marsh, 1 leg bye back of a length on middle stump, looked like the slower one. Too early into the pull and it hit him on the right side and rolled away into the backward point region

Sharma to Warner, FOUR runs down the track and the attempted yorker becomes a full-toss on off stump. Makes a bit of room as he advances, and slaps it to the left and just out of reach of the diving Pandey at short cover
Sharma to Warner, no run low full-toss on middle stump, jabbed to mid-off

Sharma to Warner, OUT gone! That was the slower ball, back of a length on off stump, and Warner backs away to manufacture room to cut. No pace on it, and the sliced uppercut drops towards backward point, where Jadeja takes a simple catch while falling to his right
Sharma to Wade, no run back of a length on off stump, goes back and across and blocks right under his eyes
Yadav to Marsh, 2 runs length ball angling into middle stump. Marsh gets his front pad out of the way and chips it back over the bowler's head

Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs length ball on off stump, and Marsh clears his front leg to make a bit more swinging room, and brings down a perfectly straight bat to drive on the up between bowler and mid-off
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run slower ball on middle stump, gets forward and lets it come on to clip to long-on
Yadav to Wade, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched to deep point

Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs long-hop, and this is just terrible bowling. Fine leg was in the circle, and deep square leg was in front of square, and he just has to swivel and put it away to the deep backward square leg boundary
Yadav to Marsh, 2 runs slower ball, full on leg stump, clipped to long-on
Jadeja to Wade, no run back of a length close to off stump, not short enough for Wade to punch and it hurries past his outside edge
Jadeja to Wade, 1 wide premeditates the sweep and Jadeja fires a full one past him, turns down the leg side
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run back of a length outside off, stabbed away towards deep point
Jadeja to Marsh, no run full on leg stump, jabbed back to the bowler
Jadeja to Marsh, FOUR runs back of a length, gives him a bit of width, and Marsh puts it away, cuts it clinically to the right of backward point
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run length ball outside off, a bit slower, and he's a bit early into the drive, slices it towards short third man
Jadeja to Wade, no run full outside off, driven to short cover
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 wide sees him moving across his crease and slants one full, down the leg side. Marsh misses the flick
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run length ball on off stump, punched to sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Wade, 1 run full and wide, looking for the wide yorker. Opens his bat face, looking to steer it to the right of backward point, and Umesh dives to his right and makes a good stop
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run slower ball on off stump, whipped towards long-on
R Dhawan to Wade, no run good slower ball, slanting away from off stump on a fullish length. Beats the attempted drive and rolls down to Dhoni
R Dhawan to Wade, FOUR runs length ball wide of off stump. Wade reaches for it and gets a thick outside edge that runs away to the third man boundary
R Dhawan to Wade, no run slower ball on off stump, clipped back to the bowler
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run fullish on off stump, swept to deep square leg
Jadeja to Wade, no run flat, quick, beats the attempted flick and turns down leg. Spotted Wade looking to walk across his stumps
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run full on off stump, Wade plays the checked drive to long-off
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run down the track and he bowls it full and angling into his feet. Marsh gets his front leg out of the way and drives to long-off
Jadeja to Wade, 2 runs sets himself up early for the sweep and laps the flighted ball outside off towards deep square leg
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run down the track and Jadeja fires it in quicker, at his feet. Driven to long-on
R Dhawan to Wade, 1 run full-toss wide of off, slower ball, reaches out and drags it to the left of sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run slower bouncer outside off. Marsh waits a long time and plays a tennis smash out to deep midwicket
R Dhawan to Wade, FOUR runs slower ball, short outside off. Plenty of swinging room and Wade muscles it to the midwicket boundary
R Dhawan to Wade, 3 runs walks across his stumps and Rishi looks to follow him. Gets down low to lap the low full-toss over short fine leg
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run full outside off, driven to sweeper cover

R Dhawan to Wade, 2 runs full-toss wide of off stump, reaches out and pokes it away towards deep point. Was in the air for a while, and Umesh flew to his left from backward point, but that was just beyond his reach
Bumrah to Marsh, 1 run full outside off, flat-batted to long-off
Bumrah to Wade, 1 run back of a length slower ball angling away from Wade, who whips it from outside off towards square leg
Bumrah to Marsh, SIX runs short, angling into off stump, and Marsh absolutely loves it there. Plants his front foot forward and pulls fiercely over the midwicket boundary
Bumrah to Marsh, 1 run near-yorker on off stump, clipped towards long-on
Bumrah to Wade, no run yorker on leg stump and Wade has to pull his feet out of the way in a hurry to stab it into the on side
Bumrah to Wade, 1 leg bye sees him coming down the pitch and follows with a full ball at his feet. Jams down and can't get bat to it, but it hits his foot and rolls away to the right of the keeper
R Dhawan to Wade, 1 run slower ball wide of off. Wade waits and flat-bats to long-off
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run comes down the track and Rishi fires it at his feet. Clipped to deep midwicket
R Dhawan to Wade, 2 runs slower ball, full and wide, slapped away to the left of sweeper cover
R Dhawan to Wade, 1 run wide yorker, reaches out and jabs to extra cover
R Dhawan to Marsh, FOUR runs slower ball, back of a length close to off stump. Marsh made a bit of room and then stayed nice and still to slap that to the cover boundary
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run full on middle stump, whipped to long-on
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run full and wide, stabbed to deep point
Sharma to Wade, 3 runs slower ball on leg stump and he clears his front leg to pull towards deep square leg
Sharma to Marsh, FOUR runs full-toss outside off and that is powerful. Strong bottom wrist comes into play as he powers that down the ground and beats long-off to his right

Sharma to Marsh, 1 run another full-toss, this one was a little lower, and out comes that bottom-handed whip again. Hits Ishant's right leg in his follow through and the ricochet narrowly misses umpire Richard Kettleborough's head
Sharma to Wade, 1 run very full on leg stump and he gets his front leg out of the way to drive to long-on
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run full and wide, driven to extra cover
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run length ball on off stump and Marsh creates room to slap that powerfully to sweeper cover
Yadav to Wade, SIX runs slower ball, ends up short outside leg, and Wade clears his front leg and just helps it over the backward square leg boundary

Yadav to Wade, OUT got him. That's a fullish ball slanting away wide of off stump. Wade looked to thrash his arms through it, having taken a big step back to shorten the length, and only succeeds in top-edging to Dhoni
Yadav to Faulkner, no run length ball outside off, comes forward to drive but can't get it past short cover
Yadav to Faulkner, 1 run full on off stump, clipped towards long-on
Yadav to Marsh, 2 runs low full-toss on leg stump, whipped towards long-on
Bumrah to Faulkner, OUT oh, Bumrah, what a delivery. Takes out Faulkner's off stump with a perfect yorker that the batsman plays all around
Bumrah to Hastings, 1 run another one in the blockhole, middle-and-off, not quite a yorker this time, and he clips it away to deep square leg
Bumrah to Marsh, 1 run yorker close to off stump, whipped to long-on. Thinks about the second to get to his hundred, but it isn't available
Bumrah to Hastings, 1 run slower ball outside off, Hastings defends into the off side with soft hands to bring Marsh back on strike
Bumrah to Marsh, no run in the blockhole close to off stump, jabbed back hard to the bowler
Bumrah to Marsh, no run low full-toss on off stump and Marsh cannot whip it past mid-on, who has been moved into the circle. An excellent finish to a splendid 10 overs on debut

Sharma to Hastings, 1 leg bye length ball angling into the pads. Doesn't get bat on the flick and it rolls off the outside of the pad to the left of Dhoni. Misfield from Dhoni gave them the chance for a second, but Hastings sends Marsh back

Sharma to Marsh, no run back of a length, angling into middle stump. Dug it in with extra effort and it was past Marsh and over the stumps before he could bring his bat down to pull. Wasn't short enough for that
Sharma to Marsh, 2 runs now he shuffles across to the full ball outside off and clips it away to the right of deep midwicket, picks up three, and reaches a fantastic maiden ODI hundred
Sharma to Marsh, no run slower ball angling down leg, following Marsh who was backing away to make room. Goes down on one knee to give it the big yahoo and misses, and the ball smacks him in the box
Sharma to Marsh, no run and again, another excellent slower ball that follows Marsh's movement away from leg stump. Through that big swipe too quickly and it hits him on the body again
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run yorker on middle and leg, clipped away towards square leg

6.07pm Australia's middle order came into the spotlight after India had them at 117 for 4, before centuries from David Warner and Mitchell Marsh made it yet another 300-plus first-innings total. For India, Jasprit Bumrah made an excellent debut, a brilliant effort to pick up 2 for 40 on a day when Australia scored 330, while Umesh Yadav had a
Hastings to S Dhawan, FOUR runs awful start. Short down leg, Dhawan helps it on its way down to the fine leg boundary.

Hastings to S Dhawan, OUT what a splendid catch that is from Shaun Marsh. A nothing delivery from Hastings, short and wide. Dhawna comes down and belts the cut in the air to deep point. He errs though and fails to keep it down. Shaun marsh runs around and leaps to take the ball over his head, both feet off the ground. And hold son desp
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to deep cover
Hastings to Kohli, no run pulled to short mid-on
Hastings to Kohli, 1 wide
Hastings to Kohli, 1 wide very short delivery outside off, the ball lobs over Kohli's head. Easy call of wide
Hastings to Kohli, no run nice shot. Back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run tickled fine to deep square leg

Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs sublime timing. That has raced to the boundary with ease. Full delivery outside off, Kohli calmly leans into a drive to finds the gap past cover for four. Shaun marsh can't do anything
Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs short and wide, cut past a diving cover for another couple
Marsh to Kohli, no run full on off, Kohli defends
Marsh to Kohli, no run short outside off, cut powerfully to backward point
Marsh to Kohli, no run fuller delivery on off, driven back
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run nice comeback in the over that. Short and wide, played down to third man
Hastings to Kohli, no run 130 kph, full on off, clipped to mid-on
Hastings to Pandey, no run full outside off, left alone
Hastings to Pandey, no run back of a length outside off, left again
Hastings to Pandey, no run another leave. Good length outside off, left alone
Hastings to Pandey, no run goes for the bouncer outside off, Pandey thinks of lofting the ball over third man but withdraws very late
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run stops on the batsman and almost carries to short cover. Full delivery outside off, Rohit checks his stroke.
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run 132 kph, fuller delivery outside off, Kept down to point
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run too straight, worked to short fine leg

Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 3 runs awesome shot, equally good fielding. Short and wide, Rohit flays a cut past point with such terrific timing that it almost makes it to the very long boundary. Shaun Marsh doesn't give up, runs all the way and keeps it in
Marsh to Pandey, 1 run clipped to wide mid-on for one
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 50 for Rohit. Played down to point and Rohit goes through with the iffy run. Makes it in the end
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, no run nice short delivery. Bouncer outside off, Rohit sways out of the line
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, no run short outside off, cut to point. Warner hits the stumps at the strikers end, rather unnecessary.
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, no run a loose waft. Good length outside off, Rohit drives loosely and is beaten
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 130 kph. Steered down to third man off the open face
Hastings to Pandey, 1 run thick outside edge, goes down to third man. Nice and full outside off, inviting the drive

Hastings to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs dropped. Very hard chance but still a chance. Shortish and wide, coming back in with that angle from wide of the crease. Rohit goes for the cut, but gets a thick edge which flies to Smith at first slip. He leaps but cannot hold on
Boland to Pandey, no run fullish delivery outside off, Pandey drives it back uppishly but in front of the bowler
Boland to Pandey, 1 run whipped off his pads to deep midwicket
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run whipped to wide mid-on
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run 134 kph. Good length on off, played down defensively
Boland to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs massive six. Shortish delivery on off, Rohit presses forward and looks to smash it, flat-bats it over wide mid-on. Knew that was six from the moment it left the bat
Boland to Rohit Sharma, no run worked to midwicket
Lyon to Pandey, no run shortish delivery on middle, clipped to midwicket
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run slightly shortish on middle, pulled down to fine leg
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run flat on off, Rohit gets down early to execute a fine paddle
Lyon to Pandey, FOUR runs smashed. In the gap and that will be four. Tossed up on off, Pandey gets down and rockets a sweep to the square leg boundary
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run slower through the air on middle, worked to deep midwicket
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run lovely fielding. Tossed up on off, Rohit comes down to drive to cover.
Boland to Pandey, 1 run back of a length outside off, steered to third man
Boland to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length, fourth-stump line. Rohit shuffles across and works it to deep square leg
Boland to Pandey, no run back of a length, angling into off stump, dabbed to point
Boland to Pandey, 2 runs drifts onto the pads and Pandey clips it away through midwicket
Boland to Pandey, no run shortish close to off stump, punched firmly but straight to cover point
Boland to Pandey, no run length ball angling into off stump, not much of a front-foot stride from Pandey as he looks to push through the mid-off/extra cover region, ends up inside-edging into his pad
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run down the track to the flighted ball drifting away from off stump, plays the checked drive to long-off
Lyon to Pandey, FOUR runs down the track comes Pandey this time and Lyon floats it wide of off stump, giving him plenty of room to flat-bat crisply to the right of short cover
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run full on middle, clipped to deep midwicket
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs tossed up on off stump and Rohit's powerful sweep beats square leg diving to his left but Marsh sprints quickly to his right from deep midwicket and makes a diving stop
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length on the pads, punched to deep midwicket
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run full, close to off stump, whipped with the turn to long-on
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run length ball angling across towards off stump. Pandey uses his wrists to play that to mid-on
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run full outside off, driven to short cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run full outside off, Rohit can't beat cover point with his square drive
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run full on middle stump and Rohit makes room to drive inside-out. Makes a good connection but Smith stops it with a dive to his left at mid-off
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length outside off, and again he fails to beat cover point. Waited on it and steered with an open face but Finch moved quickly to his left and stopped it
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and wide, and this time Finch dives to his right to stop that back-foot slap
Smith to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, slides on with the angle as Rohit makes room, looking for the punch through cover. Can only push it back to the bowler
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run this one's a little shorter and he can force it past the diving fielder at extra cover
Smith to Pandey, FOUR runs long-hop on middle stump and Pandey rocks back to pull to the vacant backward square leg boundary
Smith to Pandey, 1 run short and wide, slapped to sweeper cover
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run flighted on middle and off, clipped to long-on
Smith to Pandey, 1 run a touch short wide of off, leans back and dabs to short third man
Faulkner to Pandey, 2 runs back of a length outside off, steered to the right of third man, far enough from the fielder to complete two. That's also the half-century stand
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run short, not too much width this time, leans back and chops it to third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs back of a length on off stump and that is smashed. Makes himself a lot of room and just flat-bats it, an inside-out tennis forehand to the left of mid-off
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run slower ball, full outside off, blocked to mid-off

Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, a bit of width, and again a well struck shot goes straight to a fielder, driven to short cover this time, but it's hit hard and the fielder fumbles it to allow the single
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run back of a length on off stump, comes forward and jabs with a closed bat face to play that through square leg. Interesting-looking shot
Smith to Pandey, FOUR runs another Smith long-hop, and again Pandey is quickly back in his crease, swivels and pulls to the backward square leg boundary
Smith to Pandey, 1 run full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Smith to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs flighted ball outside off, lots of room for Rohit to free his arms and clout that over mid-on, against the turn
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on leg stump and Rohit clips it in the air, chips it deliberately to reach long-on on the bounce, hit it to the right of the fielder
Smith to Pandey, 1 run down the track, meets the flighted ball in front of off stump and drives inside-out to sweeper cover
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a bit slower now, tossed up wide of off. Rohit has to reach out for it, checks his drive and pushes towards sweeper cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs short and wide, but it's the slower one, and Rohit has to reach out for it. Doesn't quite middle it but slaps it over cover, just out of reach of the leaping fielder
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length outside off, another slower one, Rohit is beaten by the angle and lack of pace, trying to dab to third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on off stump, straightens just a touch, defended into the on side
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full outside off, driven to sweeper cover with a slightly open face
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run loopy slower ball, ends up as a wide full-toss and he reaches out to drive, ends up slicing to backward point
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs down the track to the flighted ball on middle and leg, chips it in the air, on the bounce to deep midwicket
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball outside off, dipped a touch on Rohit as he came forward, and he turns his wrists to play that to backward square leg

Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run flighted ball outside off, presses forward and pushes into the ocvers. They go for the single as Mitchell Marsh moves quickly to his left. He picks up and throws, Pandey dives into his crease and makes it home safe. Direct hit would have had him in trouble
Lyon to Pandey, SIX runs down the track comes Pandey and Lyon gives him width once more. Lovely bat-flow through that lofted inside-out drive, and it's over the rope to the left of long-off
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run back of a length on middle and leg, goes deep in his crease to tuck it towards long leg
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run quickish length ball on leg stump, gets his front leg out of the way to push down the ground to long-off
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on off stump, driven to long-on
Marsh to Pandey, 1 run shortish outside off, makes some room to dab it down to third man
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball outside off, seams away a touch to beat Rohit as he tries to dab it down to third man with an open face

Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs back of a length outside off, lets it come on and steers it to the right of third man to bring up 5000 ODI runs. He's moved to a different level over the last couple of years
Marsh to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball outside off, doesn't quite come on to Rohit. Checks his drive and rolls his wrists over at the last moment to keep it down in front of mid-off

Marsh to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on middle stump and that's dropped by Shaun Marsh. Looked to hit that over mid-off, and maybe the ball stopped on him. Bat turned in his hand and it went high over the off side. Marsh, coming in from sweeper cover, got under it and dropped a sitter. It just popped out of his hand there
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short and wide and that's punished. Rohit stands tall and just punches it away to the point boundary
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to short cover
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs length ball wide of off and that's such a sweetly timed drive to the left of short cover
Hastings to Rohit Sharma, no run excellent bouncer, rising over off stump, and Rohit thinks about hooking before deciding to abort the stroke and duck his head out of the way

Hastings to Rohit Sharma, OUT back of a length outside off, a bit of extra bounce, and Rohit goes for 99! It hurried through quicker than he expected, perhaps, as he looked to dab it towards third man, and he looks distraught when the caught behind appeal is upheld. Snicko shows the faintest of nicks, though.

Hastings to Dhoni, no run gone first ball, is he? Ooh, that looked close. Much fuller this time from Hastings, excellent first ball, angling into the stumps. Dhoni shuffled across his crease instead of moving forward or back, and that ball struck him low on the pad. Not given. Maybe an inside edge, maybe struck just outside the line. R
Marsh to Pandey, 1 run
Marsh to Dhoni, no run fuller now, drifts into the pads, clipped to long leg
Marsh to Dhoni, no run back of a length outside off, doesn't come on at all for the slap through point. Dhoni can only poke it back to the bowler
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length outside off, steered towards backward point
Marsh to Pandey, 1 run full on middle stump, clipped towards long leg
Marsh to Dhoni, no run shortish outside off, stops on the track again. Dhoni jumps and slaps to short cover
Hastings to Pandey, 2 runs back of a length outside off, dabbed towards third man

Hastings to Pandey, 2 runs full on off stump and Pandey doesn't quite get hold of the lofted drive, bounces down to the right of sweeper cover. Gets two more and that's his half-century. Excellent innings under pressure, so far
Hastings to Pandey, 2 runs short ball outside off and that's a controlled pull, almost just holds his bat up and lets the ball hit it, to place it for another couple, this time through midwicket
Hastings to Pandey, 1 run back of a length outside off, guided to third man with an open bat face
Hastings to Dhoni, no run back of a length wide of off, Dhoni leaves it alone
Hastings to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length close to off stump, punches it to the right of backward point and immediately calls for the single
Boland to Dhoni, no run back of a length on off stump, defended to short cover
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run down the track and Boland bowls it at his pads, clipped quietly towards deep square leg
Boland to Pandey, 1 run length ball outside off, Pandey comes forward for the checked drive through the covers
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length, angling into the pads, worked towards midwicket
Boland to Pandey, no run length ball angling into middle stump, defended to midwicket
Boland to Pandey, 1 run length ball outside off, opens his bat face to guide it down to third man
Hastings to Pandey, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
Hastings to Dhoni, no run back of a length close to off stump, punched to short extra cover
Hastings to Dhoni, 1 run full, wide of off. Dhoni frees his arms and drills that hard but backward point dives to his right to stop it
Hastings to Pandey, no run length ball outside off, lets it come on and pokes to backward point
Hastings to Pandey, FOUR runs dug in short and wide and Pandey jumps in the air to account for the bounce and uppercuts fiercely, hits it hard and beats third man comfortably to his right
Hastings to Pandey, no run back of a length on off stump, defended towards point
Boland to Dhoni, no run fullish on off stump, Dhoni punches towards mid-off and short cover dives to his right to intercept

Boland to Dhoni, no run down the track and Boland straightens his line. Dhoni has to play around his front pad and misses. Ball hits pad but he's a long way down the pitch. Big appeal but it's not given
Boland to Dhoni, no run Short outside off, doesn't come on to Dhoni's bat or he simply mistimes it, chops down into the ground, in the direction of cover
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run fullish ball wide of off, driven to sweeper cover
Boland to Pandey, 1 run short outside off and Pandey gets on his toes to punch crisply to deep point
Boland to Dhoni, no run back of a length on off stump, defended to short cover
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, fairly flat, swept round to deep backward square leg
Lyon to Dhoni, no run down the track, doesn't quite get to the pitch of the flighted ball on off stump, clips quietly to midwicket
Lyon to Dhoni, no run quicker now, goes on the back foot to defend the middle-stump ball back to the bowler
Lyon to Dhoni, no run back of a length on middle and leg, goes back to work to midwicket
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched down the ground to long-off
Lyon to Pandey, 1 wide flat and quick down the leg side. Gets his line wrong and it's called wide as Pandey misses the flick
Lyon to Pandey, no run floated up slower outside off, and it sneaks under Pandey's attempted sweep
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run short outside off, rises high and Dhoni can't control his pull, hits it in the air and Lyon, settling comfortably under it at deep midwicket, spills another absolute sitter
Boland to Pandey, no run back of a length on off stump, blocked into the point region
Boland to Pandey, 2 runs short and wide and Pandey slaps it away, beats backward point and they take two by the time third man runs around to field it
Boland to Pandey, no run shortish outside off, slapped to backward point
Boland to Pandey, FOUR runs down the track and Boland offers up some width. Pandey isn't quite to the pitch of it, but he frees his arms and flat-bats it so sweetly to the cover boundary
Boland to Pandey, 2 runs back of a length outside off, opens his bat face and steers it adroitly, nice and fine, to the left of the fielder at third man
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run goes back to a full ball on middle stump, clips it just wide of midwicket
Lyon to Pandey, 1 run down the track comes Pandey, loses his shape a bit as he goes for the big hit, but does well to keep it along the ground and hit to long-on
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs down the track comes Dhoni this time, muscles it powerfully to the right of long-on, and they run quickly to complete two
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run down the track again, not quite to the pitch this time, squeezes the checked drive out to long-on
Lyon to Pandey, no run flighted ball outside off, whipped with the turn to midwicket

Lyon to Pandey, 1 run nice flight on off stump, dipped on Pandey a bit. Did well to adjust, keeping his front leg inside the line and opening his bat face to play the checked drive out towards deep point
Boland to Pandey, 1 run full-toss on off stump, clubbed down the ground to long-on
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run full and wide, gets on the front foot to steer it to the right of sweeper cover. They decide, wisely, not to attempt a second as Warner's monster throw comes in
Boland to Pandey, 1 run full and wide and Pandey drives to long-off
Boland to Dhoni, 1 run wide yorker, stabbed away towards backward point
Boland to Pandey, 2 runs very full, close to off stump. Pandey makes a bit of room by moving his front leg out of the way, and jabs it away to the left of sweeper cover
Boland to Pandey, 1 run full outside off, driven to long-off
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run slower ball on leg stump, clipped through square leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run full-toss on the pads, flicked straight to short fine leg
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run slower ball wide of off, flat-batted to sweeper cover

Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 leg bye in the blockhole and Dhoni misses the flick. Hits him low on the pad, and ricochets into the off side. Huge appeal, but it isn't given. Pitched maybe just outside leg. Marginal

Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run down the track and he can't get to the pitch of this slower ball outside off. Goes through with the shot, doesn't time it, and it's hanging in the air but agonisingly wide of Bailey diving to his right from extra cover

Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run full on leg stump, clipped to midwicket, who's right on the edge of the circle, and they run a single. Smith's throw hits Dhoni's bat as he slides home, and he holds up his hands to reassure everyone that he won't run the overthrow
Marsh to Dhoni, no run slower ball wide of off stump. Dhoni has to reach out a long way, elects to leave it, maybe expecting it to be called wide, but it isn't
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run down the track, Dhoni slogs at this fullish ball outside off, and top-edges it towards third man. The ball bounces just short of Faulkner running in from the rope

Marsh to Pandey, 2 runs slower ball wide of off and Pandey picks it up early and whips it powerfully to the right of long-on. Smith sprints quickly to his right and stops it at the rope with a wholehearted tumble
Marsh to Pandey, no run well bowled. Saw him shaping to move across his crease and bowled a back-of-a-length slower ball outside off. Pandey is beaten trying to guide it down to third man
Marsh to Pandey, 1 wide takes guard on off stump this time and Marsh looks to bowl it even wider, full and wide. This time it's adjudged wide as Pandey reaches out and fails to connect
Marsh to Pandey, no run length ball on middle and leg, cramps Pandey for room. Stabs it back to the bowler

Marsh to Pandey, 2 runs full outside off and Pandey makes a bit of room and doesn't get hold of the big hit over the covers. Skews it in the air, but gets his placement spot on, right in the middle of the triangle formed by extra cover, sweeper cover and long-off

Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 leg bye full, down the leg side. Dhoni misses the flick and it deflects off the pad to the diving Wade, who appeals for caught behind. Good early call from Pandey to sneak a leg bye
Faulkner to Pandey, 2 runs low full-toss on leg stump, whipped towards long-on. Takes its time getting to the fielder and they use that time to steal a second
Faulkner to Pandey, 2 runs down the track to the wide slower ball and he flat-bats firmly to the right of long-off. Two more
Faulkner to Pandey, no run makes a bit of room and Faulkner follows with the full-toss. Whips it hard but can't get it past midwicket
Faulkner to Pandey, no run lovely slower ball, back of a length. Pandey doesn't pick up the length, is through the pull too quickly and it juuust misses off stump
Faulkner to Pandey, no run full on leg stump, clipped firmly but straight to midwicket
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run fullish, wide of off, flat-batted to long-off
Marsh to Pandey, FOUR runs wide yorker and Pandey reaches out and makes vital contact, looks to squeeze it away through point, gets an outside edge that runs away to the third man boundary
Marsh to Pandey, 1 run slower short ball outside off, wide of Pandey who's moved across his stumps. Chopped down towards backward point

Marsh to Dhoni, 2 runs down the track and he gets too close to this ball from Marsh. Jabs it down towards long-off, and the electric Pandey turns quickly to complete the second, but a direct hit would have done for him

Marsh to Dhoni, FOUR runs full and wide and this time Dhoni is right where he needs to be. Huge backlift, flat-bats it down the ground, absolutely smashes it and long-off has no chance going to his right
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run full outside off, slower ball. Dhoni slogs and inside-edges towards short fine leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run full on middle and leg, clips to midwicket, who's slightly deep and allows a reasonably comfortable single
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run down the track, looks to make room. Faulkner denies him the room with the slower ball and he slogs it out to deep midwicket, on the bounce
Faulkner to Dhoni, 2 runs full-toss on leg stump, Dhoni lap-sweeps towards long leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 leg bye sees him making room and follows him. Slogs at it, misses, and it ricochets off the pad into the off side

Faulkner to Pandey, 2 runs down the track and Pandey is an absolute genius at landing the ball short of deep fielders. Takes his bottom hand off the handle while chasing the full, wide slower ball, and it drops short of the sweeper cover fielder running to his right
Faulkner to Pandey, 2 runs down the track, Faulkner follows him, and he tucks it away through backward square leg and picks up two, leaving Dhoni at strike at the start of the last over

Marsh to Dhoni, 1 wide full and wide, and it's given wide after Dhoni leaves it alone. Harsh call, seemed to be just inside the tramline, though, as Wasim Akram reminds us on TV commentary - the line is just an indication

Marsh to Dhoni, SIX runs bam! That's a low full-toss outside off, in Dhoni's slot, but in this innings he hasn't been middling anything. He doesn't middle this either, but he just about clears the leaping long-off fielder. Warner is the fielder. He would have needed to be as tall as Mohammad Irfan to take that

Marsh to Pandey, FOUR runs shot. That's full outside off, a wide yorker, almost, and Pandey, cool as a cucumber, brings up his hundred in style. Lets it come on, opens his bat face at impact, and steers it fine to the third man boundary. This has been an outstanding one-day innings
Marsh to Pandey, 2 runs and it's all over. Full outside off and Pandey launches this over the covers. Doesn't really middle it, but all he needs to do is clear the infield, and that's what he does

10.12pm This is the first successful 300-plus chase against Australia in Australia. India will feel they should have crossed off that achievement in the previous game itself, but they've done it here, and they've done it with six wickets in hand. Superb innings from Pandey, came in when India had lost a bit of impetus with the quick wickets o

10.30pm Phew. What a game to end this ODI series. We'll soon have reports and analysis of everything that happened up on our site. Do take a look when they go up. The T20 series begins on Tuesday - make sure you tune in for that as well. Until then, goodbye!
India won by 6 wickets (with 2 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Manish Pandey, INDIA
